Synopsis: While diving for sunken treasure, street-smart gumshoe Tony Rome (Frank Sinatra) finds the body of a gorgeous blonde, her feet stuck in a block of cement. Soon after, tough guy Waldo Gronski (Dan Blocker) hires him to find a missing woman named Sandra Lomax, and Rome wonders if there's a connection. He sets about trying to locate the woman, and in no time finds himself mixed up with a beautiful party girl (Raquel Welch) and a slippery racketeer (Martin Gabel).
Title: Lady in Cement
